controls.title: AI Governance Policy
controls.description: The organization maintains a formal AI governance and oversight policy.

controls.title: Leadership Roles & Accountability
controls.description: Leadership establishes roles and responsibilities for AI system governance.

controls.title: Access Control for AI Systems
controls.description: AI systems require strong authentication, authorization, and privileged access controls.

controls.title: AI Risk Management Program
controls.description: The organization maintains a formal AI risk management framework aligned with enterprise risk processes.
